scripts.package-icons: shx mkdir -p ../neo-npm-package/neo/dist/css/icons/ && shx cp ../css-library/neo/neo-scss/icons.scss ../neo-npm-package/neo/dist/css/icons/neo-icons.css && shx cp ./icons-functions/icon-utility-files/iconInfo.js ../neo-icons-npm-package/neo-icon-info.js && shx cp ../css-library/neo/neo-scss/icons.scss ../neo-icons-npm-package/neo-icons.css
